channel.title: Clojure for Data Science
channel.description: This is the blog to accompany the book Clojure for Data Science published by Packt.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description:
Welcome to the companion website for the book Clojure for Data Science. The book is currently being written by Henry Garner and will be published by Packt in the second half of 2015.

All code examples will be made available on the book's GitHub repo for download. As publication approaches this site (and the related wiki) will be updated with excerpts and further information related to data science in general and Clojure in particular.

See you soon.
